user.title: Walutomat Setup
user.description:
To monitor your account balances, please enter your Walutomat API key. You can generate one in the [Walutomat user panel]({api_key_url}).

If you leave the API key field empty, the integration will only create public exchange rate sensors.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the Walutomat API. Please check your API key and try again.

abort.already_configured: This Walutomat account is already configured.
